shortDescription: ADR-189 Guides: B6 Color fix + Y-axis bubbles/dimensions moved to right edge
problem: B6 Color palette did not work (menu auto-closed), Y-axis bubbles and dimensions rendered on left side overlapping with ruler
cause: Radix DropdownMenuItem auto-closes on click (needed onSelect+preventDefault). Y-axis rendering used left edge constants instead of right edge.
solution: 3 fixes: (1) B6 Color palette — changed onClick to onSelect with preventDefault to keep menu open, (2) Y-axis dimension annotations moved from left to right edge (viewport.width - edge), (3) Y-axis bubbles (number circles 1,2,3) moved from left to right edge (viewport.width - BUBBLE_LEFT_X)
testing: Pre-commit checks passed. Vercel auto-deployment triggered.
notes: Y-axis bubbles and dimensions now render on the RIGHT side of the viewport, away from the vertical ruler on the left. X-axis elements remain at top (unchanged). Color palette now stays open when clicking the Color menu item.

commits.message: fix(guides): B6 color palette onSelect fix + Y-axis dimensions to right edge
fix(guides): move Y-axis bubbles to right edge (away from ruler)
